[Page Title: The Pass - Artisan Deli and Market]

View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize Ciao, Paisan! Visit us in Downtown Charleston: 
Location: 207A Saint Philip St., Charleston, SC 29403 (Corner of Spring St. & Saint Philip St.)

Shop Hours: Wednesday to Sunday, 10AM to 3PM

Call: (854) 444.3960
Visit us in Mount Pleasant: 
Location: 976J Houston Northcutt Blvd., Mount Pleasant, SC 29464 (within Northcutt Plaza)

Shop Hours: Monday to Saturday, 10AM to 3PM

Call: (843) 284.8687
Please visit our Instagram (@thepasschs) for details and daily happenings. Dine-In | Take-Out | Delivery 
Hungry for More? Discover our nighttime concept,
The Italian Boy After Dark
